'''Warner Bros.''' is a world-wide film and television American company based in Burbank, California, currently owned by Warner Bros. Discovery.

Currently, the company has the distribution rights of [[The Hobbit (1967 film)|almost]] all licensed film adaptations of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|J.R.R. Tolkien's]] works.

==Subsidiaries==
* [[New Line Cinema]], film studio of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]
* [[Warner Bros. Games]], publisher of every Middle-earth related videogame since 2010.
* [[Turbine]], former developers and publishers of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.
* [[Snowblind Studios]], developer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''.
* [[Monolith Productions]], developer of ''[[Guardians of Middle-earth]]'', ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]'' and ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of War]]''.
